bibl.title: Allegorical Images in Greek Laudatory Inscriptions in Eretz-Israel.
bibl.note: Discusses epigrams containing allegorical images and expressions concerning the mosaics, in part. I. métriques 122 (from Sheikh Zuweid). - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 70 (2001) No. 9426.
OVADIAH Asher, Allegorical Images in Greek Laudatory Inscriptions in Eretz-Israel.
